encode.description: Encode a Lua table to a JSON string. For details see the [documentation of the original Lua library]("http"://kyne.com.au/~mark/software/lua-cjson-manual.html#encode).

decode.description: Decode a JSON string to a Lua table. For details see the [documentation of the original Lua library]("http"://kyne.com.au/~mark/software/lua-cjson-manual.html#_decode).
decode.returns: Lua table representation of the JSON data
